amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to implement any rule or regulation regarding the disclosure of political contributions that takes effect on or after the date of enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 42 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement any rule or regulation regarding the disclosure of political contributions that takes effect on or after the date of enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A055) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 170 (Roll no. 404).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A055) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 170 (Roll no. 404).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Cole.
